methods.name: cfx_checkBalanceAgainstTransaction
methods.summary: Check if a user's balance is enough to send a transaction with the specified gas and storage limits to the specified contract
methods.description: Check if a user's balance is enough to send a transaction with the specified gas and storage limits to the specified contract. The balance is enough if the user can cover the up-front payment of both execution and storage, or if these costs are sponsored by the contract

result.name: checkResult
result.description: a check result object

willPayCollateral.description: false if the transaction is eligible for storage collateral sponsorship, true otherwise

willPayTxFee.description: false if the transaction is eligible for gas sponsorship, true otherwise

examples.name: Mainnet Example
examples.summary: check balance against transaction in mainnet

methods.name: cfx_getSkippedBlocksByEpoch
methods.summary: Returns the list of non-executed blocks in an epoch
methods.description: Returns the list of non-executed blocks in an epoch. By default, Conflux only executes the last 200 blocks in each epoch (note that under normal circumstances, epochs should be much smaller)

result.name: blockHashArray
result.description: array of skipped block hashes

examples.name: Mainnet Example
examples.summary: get skipped blocks by epoch number parameter in mainnet

epochNumberOrTAGDefaultingToLatestState.name: optionalEpochNumberOrTAG
epochNumberOrTAGDefaultingToLatestState.summary: Parameter for epoch number (optional, defaulting to `latest_state`)
epochNumberOrTAGDefaultingToLatestState.description: (optional, default: `'latest_state'`) the epoch number, or the string `'latest_mined'`, `'latest_state'`, `'latest_confirmed'`, `'latest_checkpoint'` or `'earliest'`, see [the epoch number parameter](http://developer.confluxnetwork.org/conflux-doc/docs/json_rpc/#the-epoch-number-parameter)

oneOf.description: epoch number

epochNumberOrTAG.name: epochNumberOrTAG
epochNumberOrTAG.description: the epoch number, or the string `'latest_mined'`, `'latest_state'`, `'latest_confirmed'`, `'latest_checkpoint'` or `'earliest'`, see [the epoch number parameter](http://developer.confluxnetwork.org/conflux-doc/docs/json_rpc/#the-epoch-number-parameter)

epochNumberTAG.name: epochNumberTAG
epochNumberTAG.description: tag for epoch number. String `'latest_mined'`, `'latest_state'`, `'latest_confirmed'`, `'latest_checkpoint'` or `'earliest'`, see [the epoch number parameter](http://developer.confluxnetwork.org/conflux-doc/docs/json_rpc/#the-epoch-number-parameter)

transactionObjectFlag.name: transactionObjectFlag
transactionObjectFlag.description: if `true`, the method returns the full transaction objects. If `false`, only the hashes of the transactions are returned

transactionResult.name: transactionResult
transactionResult.description: A transaction object, or `null` when no transaction was found

oneOf.description: A transaction object. Note that the fields `blockHash`, `contractCreated`, `status`, and `transactionIndex` are provided by the node as they depend on the transaction's position within the ledger. The rest of the fields are included in or derived from the original transaction
`null` when no transaction was found

blockResult.name: blockResult
blockResult.description: A block object, or `null` when no block was found

oneOf.description: A block object. Note that the fields `epochNumber` and `gasUsed` are provided by the node as they depend on the ledger. The rest of the fields are included in or derived from the block header directly.
`null` when no block was found

EpochNumberOrTAG.title: QUANTITY | TAG
EpochNumberOrTAG.description: the epoch number, or the string `'latest_mined'`, `'latest_state'`, `'latest_confirmed'`, `'latest_checkpoint'` or `'earliest'`, see [the epoch number parameter](http://developer.confluxnetwork.org/conflux-doc/docs/json_rpc/#the-epoch-number-parameter)

oneOf.description: 32 Bytes DATA - hash of the block where this transaction was in and got executed
`null` when the transaction is pending

chainId.description: the chain ID specified by the sender

oneOf.description: address of the contract created
`null` when the transaction is not a contract deployment transaction

data.description: the data sent along with the transaction

epochHeight.description: the epoch proposed by the sender. Note that this is NOT the epoch of the block containing this transaction

gasPrice.description: gas price provided by the sender in Drip

nonce.description: the number of transactions made by the sender prior to this one

oneOf.description: 0 for success, 1 for error occured
`null` when the transaction is skipped or not packed

storageLimit.description: the storage limit specified by the sender

oneOf.description: address of the receiver
`null` when it is a contract deployment transaction
the transaction's position in the block
`null` when the transaction is pending

adaptive.description: `true` if the weight of the block is adaptive under the GHAST rule

blame.description: if 0, then this block does not blame any blocks on its parent path. If it is `n > 0`, then this block blames its `n` predecessors on its parent path, e.g. when `n = 1`, then the block blames its parent but not its parent's parent

deferredLogsBloomHash.description: 32 Bytes - the hash of the logs bloom after deferred execution at the block's epoch (assuming it is the pivot block)

deferredReceiptsRoot.description: 32 Bytes - the Merkle root of the receipts after deferred execution at the block's epoch (assuming it is the pivot block)

deferredStateRoot.description: 32 Bytes - the hash of the state trie root triplet after deferred execution at the block's epoch (assuming it is the pivot block)

difficulty.description: the PoW difficulty of this block

oneOf.description: the number of the epoch containing this block in the node's view of the ledger
`null` when the epoch number is not determined (e.g. the block is not in the best block's past set)

gasLimit.description: the maximum gas allowed in this block

oneOf.description: the total gas used in this block
`null` when the block is pending

miner.description: the address of the beneficiary to whom the mining rewards were given

nonce.description: 8 Bytes - hash of the generated proof-of-work

parentHash.description: 32 Bytes - hash of the parent block

oneOf.description: the PoW quality
`null` when the block is pending

size.description: the size of this block in bytes, excluding the block header

timestamp.description: the unix timestamp for when the block was created

oneOf.description: transaction objects if the second parameter is `true`
32-byte transaction hashes if the second parameter is `false`

transactionsRoot.description: 32 Bytes - the Merkle root of the transactions in this block

oneOf.description: 32 Bytes - the storage root in the delta trie
string `'TOMBSTONE'`
32 Bytes - storage root in the intermediate trie
string `'TOMBSTONE'`
32 Bytes - storage root in the snapshot
string `'TOMBSTONE'`

sponsorGasBound.description: the max gas that could be sponsored for one transaction

sponsorForCollateral.description: the address of the storage sponsor

sponsorForGas.description: the address of the gas sponsor

from.description: (optional, default: random address) address of sender

to.description: (optional, default: null for contract creation) address of receiver

gasPrice.description: (optional, default: 0) gas price provided by the sender in Drip

gas.description: (optional, default: 500000000) gas provided by the sender

data.description: (optional, default: 0x) the data send along with the transaction

nonce.description: (optional, default: 0) the number of transactions made by the sender prior to this one

storageCollateralized.description: size of storage collateralized, in bytes

fromEpoch.description: (optional, default: `'latest_checkpoint') the epoch number, or the string `'latest_mined'`, `'latest_state'`, `'latest_confirmed'`, `'latest_checkpoint'` or `'earliest'`, see [the epoch number parameter](http://developer.confluxnetwork.org/conflux-doc/docs/json_rpc/#the-epoch-number-parameter)

toEpoch.description: (optional, default: `'latest_state') the epoch number, or the string `'latest_mined'`, `'latest_state'`, `'latest_confirmed'`, `'latest_checkpoint'` or `'earliest'`, see [the epoch number parameter](http://developer.confluxnetwork.org/conflux-doc/docs/json_rpc/#the-epoch-number-parameter)

blockHashes.description: (optional, default: null) Array of up to 128 block hashes that the search will be applied to. This will override from/to epoch fields if it's not `null`

address.description: (optional, default: null) Search contract addresses. If null, match all. If specified, the log must be produced by one of these contracts

topics.description: (optional, default: null) 32-byte event topics.Logs can have 4 topics: the event signature and up to 3 indexed event arguments. The elements of topics match the corresponding log topics. Example: ['0xA', null, ['0xB', '0xC'], null] matches logs with '0xA' as the 1st topic AND ('0xB' OR '0xC') as the 3rd topic. If null, match all.

limit.description: (optional, default: null) If null return all logs, otherwise should only return the last limit logs. Note: if the node has get_logs_filter_max_limit set, it will override limit if it is null or greater than the preset value

address.description: address of the contract that emitted the log

blockHash.description: 32 Bytes - hash of the block containing the log

epochNumber.description: epoch number of the block containing the log

transactionHash.description: 32 Bytes - hash of the transaction that created the log
32 Bytes - hash of the given transaction

blockHash.description: 32 Bytes - hash of the block where this transaction was in and got executed

epochNumber.description: epoch number of the block where this transaction was in and got executed

oneOf.description: address of the receiver
`null` when it is a contract deployment transaction

gasUsed.description: gas used for executing the transaction

gasFee.description: gas charged to the sender's account. If the provided gas (gas limit) is larger than the gas used, at most 1/4 of it is refunded

gasCoveredBySponsor.description: true if this transaction's gas fee was covered by the sponsor

storageCollateralized.description: the amount of storage collateral this transaction required

storageCoveredBySponsor.description: true if this transaction's storage collateral was covered by the sponsor

storageReleased.description: array of storage change objects, each specifying an address and the corresponding amount of storage collateral released, e.g., `[{ 'address': 'CFX:TYPE.USER:AARC9ABYCUE0HHZGYRR53M6CXEDGCCRMMYYBJGH4XG', 'collaterals': '0x280' }]`

oneOf.description: address of the contract created
`null` when the transaction is not a contract deployment transaction

stateRoot.description: 32 Bytes - hash of the state root after the execution of the corresponding block. `0` if the state root is not available

outcomeStatus.description: the outcome status code. `0x0` means success

logsBloom.description: 256 Bytes - bloom filter for light clients to quickly retrieve related logs

logs.description: array of log objects that this transaction generated, see cfx_getLogs

storageReleased.description: the amount of storage collateral released of the address

AccountState.title: AccountState
AccountState.description: the state of a given account

nonce.description: the nonce of the account's next transaction

codeHash.description: the code hash of the account

stakingBalance.description: the staking balance of the account

collateralForStorage.description: the collateral storage of the account

accumulatedInterestReturn.description: accumulated interest return of the account

bestHash.description: hash of the latest epoch's pivot block

totalReward.description: total reward of the block including base reward, tx fee, staking reward

accumulatedInterestRate.description: the accumulated interest rate at the time of the deposit

unlockBlockNumber.description: the block number at which the locked tokens are released

QUANTITY.title: QUANTITY
QUANTITY.description: Integer encode as hex string, prefix with '0x'

TAG.title: TAG
TAG.description: Tag for epoch number. String `'latest_mined'`, `'latest_state'`, `'latest_confirmed'`, `'latest_checkpoint'` or `'earliest'`

DATA.title: DATA
DATA.description: Byte arrays, account addresses, hashes or bytecode arrays encoded as hex, prefix with '0x', two hex digits per byte
